comments.body: @gunan @drpngx There seems something wrong with the condition `x1 > x2`, which might be unstable for gradient calculation. I think that's why tests failed.
@drpngx I want to confirm that:  Is `NaryGradTest.Select` the only one failed test?
I can't remember on the top of my head. I thought there was another one. You can try `bazel test --runs_per_test=100` and you should find it.
Fine, I'll look into it later. Thanks for your quick reply, @drpngx .
I have opened #15807 to fix the unstable test case. Might you take a look? Thanks.

Since `lgamma` is the log of the absolute value of `Gamma(x)`, the values are referred from Wiki: 

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/52/Gamma_plot.svg/650px-Gamma_plot.svg.png)
